reviews.review: super indico pelos desafios e belo desenvolvimento <3

A classic! Puzzles with portals. Simple and fun. Even the advanced levels aren't very hard but it makes up for it with that butt-clenching feeling when you use portals to launch yourself to a door that will close soon.

Preparación
Tiempo de preparación: 20 minutos.

 

Rehogá en una sartén con aceite a fuego medio la cebolla, el puerro y el pimiento (todos picados). Cocinalos por unos 5 minutos hasta que comiencen a tomar color y ablandarse.

Incorporá a la preparación el pollo cortado en cubos pequeños y cociná por 8 minutos más. Al retirar todo del fuego, añadí las aceitunas cortadas en rodajas y el huevo rallado. Condimentá con sal, Pimentón Seleccionado Dulce y Orégano Alicante.
 

Para el armado:

Colocá el relleno en las tapas de empanadas y cerralas formando el repulgue. Disponelas sobre una asadera para horno previamente espolvoreada con harina.

Cocinalas a horno precalentado a temperatura media por unos 20 minutos aprox. o hasta que comiencen a verse doraradas.

I agree, it's a modern classic. First person shooter where you don't shoot enemies (kind of). It's super short, but as you can see from my playtime it can be extended to much more due to different reasons. You can learn to speedrun it. You can let your friends play it and you can see their way of solving puzzles which is fantastic way to learn about different players solving skills if you try to desing your own games. There are advanced version of levels from the main game and there are time challenges. It is packed with all kinds of stuff. As always you can expect brilliant story because of Valve single player games and there's a sarcastic AI narrator which spies on you and has cake for you. Don't wait, get it. It doesn't require strong PC so you can launch it mostly anywhere.
ONe of the best games I've played
